Description: Deadfall Adventures - Adventure FPS, which is set in 1938. Players will play the role of James Lee Quatermain traveler accompanying the U.S. agent, Jennifer Goodwin, in an Egyptian temple in search of an ancient artifact "Heart of Atlantis." But not only the Americans had their eye on the artifact - German occultists of Ahnenerbe also want to get it. Persecuted by the Nazis, James will visit various parts of the world, from the deserts of Egypt and the icy Arctic to the jungles of Guatemala.
